Raza Hussain, D.M.D.

2021 Entrepreneur in Residence Fellow

Dr. Raza Hussain serves as the Chief, Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery (OMFS) at the Jesse Brown VA Medical Center. As an Entrepreneur in Residence, Dr. Hussain worked on Teeth-in-a-Day, a program that aims to redefine OMFS by offering implant-based, immediate load, full-arch prosthodontic rehabilitation of a patient's entire missing dentition and surrounding soft tissue structures. This method allows an eligible Veteran who is missing all his/her teeth, or who has teeth damaged beyond repair, to have them replaced with an implant retained prothesis in one appointment.
